function.description: Open a new page in the browser
function.name: browser_open_page

url.description: The URL to open in the browser

function.description: Get all clickable elements on the current page
function.name: browser_get_clickable_elements

function.description: Click an element on the current page by its index
function.name: browser_click_element

index.description: The index of the element to click

function.description: Take a screenshot of the current page
function.name: browser_take_screenshot

dimension.description: Dimension of the screen shot (e.g. 1024x768), default is 480x270

function.description: Press Enter key on the current page
function.name: browser_press_enter

function.description: Type text into focused field on the current page
function.name: browser_type_text

text.description: The text to type into the page
